name: lock_getOpenStatus
description: This function is used to check if a lockable SmartThings device is open.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check if it is open.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to check if multiple devices are open.
